definitions.body: lit. [[אִישׁ חָלָק]] Ge 27:11 (J), smooth man (opp. [[אישׁ שָׂעִר]]); [[הָהָר הֶחָלָק]] Jos 11:17, Jos 12:7 the bald mt. (both D); southern limit of Jos.'s conquest, identif. dub.; (1) white cliffs 8 m. S. of Dead Sea, and (2) Mt. Mâdara SW. fr. Pass es-Ṣafâ are proposed, v. Di.; as subst. [[חַלְּקֵי־נַחַל]] Is 57:6 (v. I. [[חֵלָק]],
) smooth (stones) of a brook-bed (ravine, wady), i.e. thou worshippest common round stones (contempt., v. Che Di).
fig. of mouth uttering smooth words [[וְחָלָק מִשֶּׁמֶן חִכָּהּ]] Pr 5:3 cf. Pr 26:28.
as subst. = flattery [[מִקְסָם חָלָק]] Ez Eze 12:24 divination of flattery.
